SEARCH
Package Controller

Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
Controller.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
AudioManager is a singleton class that handles the playing, pausing, and stopping of audio files in the game. It supports both background music and individual sound effects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static AudioManager
    getInstance()
    Returns the singleton instance of AudioManager.
    void
    pause()
    Pauses the current sound effect if it's playing.
    void
    pauseBackgroundMusic()
    Pauses the background music if it's currently playing.
    void
    play(String filename)
    Plays a single sound effect (non-looping).
    void
    playBackgroundMusic(String filename)
    Plays the specified background music file and loops it continuously.
    void
    resume()
    Resumes the sound effect if it was paused.
    void
    resumeBackgroundMusic()
    Resumes the background music if it was paused.
    void
    stopBackgroundMusic()
    Stops the background music if it's currently playing and releases the resources.

    • playBackgroundMusic

      public void playBackgroundMusic(String filename)
      Plays the specified background music file and loops it continuously.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the background music file (without extension).

    • stopBackgroundMusic

      Stops the background music if it's currently playing and releases the resources.
